title: Canterwood Crest
description: Some Girls Just Have To Be The Best At Everything.If any two girls know about being the best, it's Heather Fox and Jasmine King. Just ask them; they'll be happy to tell you.But every girl knows that there can only be one "best."Can Sasha keep the girls from turning the arena into a war zone and still snag a spot on the coveted Youth Equestrian National Team?
author: Jessica Burkhart
